languages.text: {n}Патлатый матрос вздрагивает, когда вы к нему обращаетесь.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Гельвики-Прайм был отъявленным мерзавцем, которому свет Бога-Императора противен — уж такого он устраивал тем, кто ниже... мы только и выжили тем, что воровали у него — иначе бы оказались в трупной яме, как каждый четвертый после аварии на распределительных станциях. И когда я оттуда вырвался, то все, больше не по этому делу. Как на службу к вам попал, так и понял, что вот оно — дар судьбы, и я дураком буду, если за такое счастье не буду платить трудом беззаветным..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Патлатый матрос вздрагивает, когда вы к нему обращаетесь.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Гельвики-Прайм был отъявленным мерзавцем. Но таким, как он, закон не писан. Мы сами воровали только то, что уже губернатор украл. Перекупали уже купленных чиновников. Это я признаю".

languages.text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."
languages.original_text: {n}Патлатый матрос вздрагивает, когда вы к нему обращаетесь.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Гельвики-Прайм был отъявленным мерзавцем, которому свет Бога-Императора противен — уж такого он устраивал тем, кто ниже... мы только и выжили тем, что воровали у него — иначе бы оказались в трупной яме, как каждый четвертый после аварии на распределительных станциях. И когда я оттуда вырвался, то все, больше не по этому делу. Как на службу к вам попал, так и понял, что вот оно — дар судьбы, и я дураком буду, если за такое счастье не буду платить трудом беззаветным..."

languages.text: {n}長い髪のヴォイズマンは、あなたに声をかけられるとビクッとした。{/n}「{mf|旦那|姫}様、ヘルヴィカ・プライムの総督は、神帝陛下のご威光を忌み嫌う外道でした。奴が自分の民に何をしていたか…私たちが生き延びられたのは、奴から盗むしかなかったからです。そうしなければ、配給所の事故の時、四人に一人がそうなったように、死体穴に放り込まれていたでしょう。けれど、あそこを出てから、悪いことはしていません。あの手のことからは完全に足を洗ったんです。そしてあなた様のもとに仕えることになったとき、これは運命の恵みだと気づきました。この幸運に全身全霊で恩返ししなくてどうする、と──そう思ったんです」
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い髪のヴォイズマンは、あなたに声をかけられるとビクッとした。{/n}「{mf|旦那|姫}様、ヘルヴィカ・プライムの総督は、神帝陛下のご威光を忌み嫌う外道でした。奴が自分の民に何をしていたか…私たちが生き延びられたのは、奴から盗むしかなかったからです。そうしなければ、配給所の事故の時、四人に一人がそうなったように、死体穴に放り込まれていたでしょう。けれど、あそこを出てから、悪いことはしていません。あの手のことからは完全に足を洗ったんです。そしてあなた様のもとに仕えることになったとき、これは運命の恵みだと気づきました。この幸運に全身全霊で恩返ししなくてどうする、と──そう思ったんです」

languages.text: {n}Uzun saçlı uçsuz eri, kendisine hitap ettiğinde irkiliyor.{/n} "Helvica Prime'ın valisi, Tanrı İmparator'un ışığını hor gören bir pisliğin tekiydi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Altındaki insanlara yaptıkları... Dağıtım istasyonundaki kazadan sonra her dört kişiden birinin başına geldiği gibi sonumuzun ceset çöplüğü olmaması için kendisinden çalarak hayatta kaldık. Oradan çıkar çıkmaz o işi temelli bıraktım. Size hizmet ederken de bunun, kaderin bir armağanı olduğunu anladım. Bu iyi talihin karşılığını vermek için tüm kalbimle çalışmamak büyük ahmaklık olurdu..."
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzun saçlı uçsuz eri, kendisine hitap ettiğinde irkilir.{/n} "Helvica Prime'ın valisi, Tanrı İmparator'un ışığını hor gören bir pisliğin tekiydi sayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Altındaki insanlara yaptıkları... Dağıtım istasyonu kazasından sonra her dört kişiden birinin başına geldiği gibi sonumuzun ceset çöplüğünde olmaması için kendisinden çalarak hayatta kaldık. Ama oradan çıkar çıkmaz da o işi temelli bıraktım. Size hizmet ederken de bunun, kaderin bir armağanı olduğunu anladım. Bu iyi talihin karşılığını vermek için tüm kalbimle çalışmamak büyük ahmaklık olurdu..."

languages.text: {n}El melenudo infante del vacío tiembla cuando te diriges a él.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador de Helvica Prime era un monstruo que aborrecía la luz del Dios Emperador. Lo que hacía con sus subordinados... Solo sobrevivimos a base de robarle, porque si no, habríamos acabado en una fosa, como uno de cada cuatro tras un incidente en una estación de distribución. Sin embargo, una vez logré salir, se acabó. Dejé atrás esa vida para siempre. Y cuando acabé a su servicio, supe que fue en don del destino y que sería el colmo de la insensatez no pagárselo con el sudor de mi frente...».
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El melenudo infante del vacío tiembla cuando te diriges a él.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador de Helvica Prime era un monstruo que aborrecía la luz del Dios Emperador. Lo que hacía con sus subordinados... Solo sobrevivimos a base de robarle, porque si no, habríamos acabado en una fosa, como uno de cada cuatro tras un incidente en una estación de distribución. Sin embargo, una vez logré salir, se acabó. Dejé atrás esa vida para siempre. Y cuando acabé a su servicio, supe que fue en don del destino y que sería el colmo de la insensatez no pagárselo con el sudor de mi frente...».

languages.text: {n}在你的凝视下，那个长发船员畏畏缩缩地开了口。{/n}“大人，赫尔维卡的总督是个人渣。他憎恶神皇的明光，他对待手下臣民的方式，更是畜生不如……我们想活下来，就不得不偷他的东西，否则就只能烂死在尸坑里，就像当初配给站出事的时候，四分之一的人都这么一命呜呼了。不过，等我从那里逃出来之后，那些勾当我就再也没干过了，我和那些事情再也没有瓜葛了。当我为您效力的时候，我意识到，这就是命运对我的恩赐。要是我不感谢命运对我的照顾，不全心全意努力工作，那简直是蠢到家了……”
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

traits.locale_text: {n}在你的凝视下，那个长发船员畏畏缩缩地开了口。{/n}“大人，赫尔维卡的总督是个人渣。他憎恶神皇的明光，他对待手下臣民的方式，更是畜生不如……我们想活下来，就不得不偷他的东西，否则就只能烂死在尸坑里，就像当初配给站出事的时候，四分之一的人都这么一命呜呼了。不过，等我从那里逃出来之后，那些勾当我就再也没干过了，我和那些事情再也没有瓜葛了。当我为您效力的时候，我意识到，这就是命运对我的恩赐。要是我不感谢命运对我的照顾，不全心全意努力工作，那简直是蠢到家了……”

languages.text: {n}Le cosmomarin aux cheveux longs frémit lorsque vous l'interpellez.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur d'Helvica Prime était une véritable ordure. Il méprisait la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu... Si vous saviez tout ce qu'il a infligé à ses sujets... Pour survivre, on était contraints de voler. Sinon, on aurait fini au fond d'un charnier, comme un quart de mes camarades après un accident au poste de distribution. Mais une fois que j'ai réussi à m'échapper, j'ai fait une croix sur tout ça. Et quand je me suis retrouvé à votre service, j'ai compris qu'il s'agissait d'un don du destin et qu'il fallait que je le remercie en travaillant d'arrache-pied... »
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cosmomarin aux cheveux longs frémit lorsque vous l'interpellez.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur d'Helvica Prime était une véritable ordure. Il méprisait la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu... Si vous saviez tout ce qu'il a infligé à ses sujets... Pour survivre, on était contraints de voler. Sinon, on aurait fini au fond d'un charnier, comme un quart de mes camarades après un accident au poste de distribution. Mais une fois que j'ai réussi à m'échapper, j'ai fait une croix sur tout ça. Et quand je me suis retrouvé à votre service, j'ai compris qu'il s'agissait d'un don du destin et qu'il fallait que je le remercie en travaillant d'arrache-pied... »

languages.text: {n}Der langhaarige Raumfahrer zuckt zusammen, als du ihn ansprichst.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der Gouverneur von Helvica Prime war ein Mistkerl, der das Licht des Gottimperators verachtet hat ... was er seinen Untergebenen angetan hat ... Wir haben nur überlebt, weil wir ihn bestohlen haben. Andernfalls wären wir in einer Leichengrube gelandet wie einer von vieren nach einem Zwischenfall in einer Verteilungsstation. Aber sobald ich dort weg war, habe ich keine krummen Geschäfte mehr gemacht. Euch zu dienen, war für mich ein Geschenk des Schicksals. Ich wäre ein Narr, wenn ich Euch diese Gnade nicht mit aufrichtiger Arbeit vergelten würde ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The long-haired voidsman flinches when you address him.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the governor of Helvica Prime was a scumbag who abhorred the light of the God-Emperor — the things he did to the people under him... We only survived by stealing from him, or else we'd have ended up in a corpse pit, like one in four did after a distribution station accident. But once I'd got out of there, that was it, I was out of that business for good. And when I found myself in your service, I realised that it was a gift of fate, and I'd be a fool if I didn't repay such good fortune with my wholehearted toil..."

Wir haben nur überlebt, weil wir ihn bestohlen haben. Andernfalls wären wir in einer Leichengrube gelandet wie einer von vieren nach einem Zwischenfall in einer Verteilungsstation. Aber sobald ich dort weg war, habe ich keine krummen Geschäfte mehr gemacht. Euch zu dienen, war für mich ein Geschenk des Schicksals. Ich wäre ein Narr, wenn ich Euch diese Gnade nicht mit aufrichtiger Arbeit vergelten würde ..."
